entries.s_f7c66216: In that case, please enjoy the fabulous Lucky Despot.
entries.s_f0f3bea2: That depends on what sort of business you have in mind.
entries.s_e27c50ad: It is never wise to stick your nose into the Lady's business. Do you wish to do business with us or not?
entries.s_b4cc3fb7: I don't think I have anything that the Lady is interested in.
entries.s_a3ad61f1: Very well. Good day to you.
entries.s_94fa366f: Of course, lets conduct some business.
entries.s_7debe28e: The Lady deals with all assortment of items. Anything from a CDEF to an imperial T-21. Of course, she currently has a special interest in hand-to-hand weapons. She also has a liking to various other odds and ends that can fetch a nice profit if you know the right people.
entries.s_6dbdfc7: Greetings and be welcome. Please enjoy the facilities here at the Lucky Despot. Are you here to try your luck at one of our gaming tables or....perhaps you are here for business rather then pleasure?
entries.s_63a817cf: Let me see what you have to offer. If I see anything that we might be interested in dealing with I will make an offer on. It is very wise to accept the generous offer that Lady V grants.
entries.s_50c8b3e1: I am just taking a look around.
entries.s_50b9f32f: What does Lady Valarian want with melee weapons?
entries.s_4717ab1e: Perhaps you are here to sell something. Something that  might be a little hard to sell elsewhere. Many people come here looking for Lady V's help in moving things that they otherwise cannot. If it something that the Lady deals with she might be willing to take it off of your hands.
entries.s_14b517b1: What sort of things does Lady Valarian deal in?
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (junk_sneg_valarian.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
